Here's how you can help protect the environment straight after your dinner 

‚Ä¢Pour leftover cooking fats into a heat proof container        
‚Ä¢Leave to cool

Share this with whoever‚Äôs doing the dishes

#DontFeedAFatberg #Unblocktober

tweets.text: This is one of the ponds at Broadwells, Warwickshire. We stopped further work just before this was filmed 15June, 2020. HS2 SUBSEQUENTLY found great crested newts here. So - their claims for thorough surveys are bunkum. Same for Jones Hill Wood. And Broadwells Wood itself. https://t.co/XhIToD9ToA

Never put wet wipes, cotton pads or kitchen roll down the toilet.

They don't break down in the same way as toilet paper - leading to blocked sewers. Only flush the 3 Ps - pee, poo and toilet paper.

Share the video to let others know¬†how to protect¬†their¬†pipes this #Unblocktober https://t.co/2fGsxkivfv

@DangleSpanners @Feargal_Sharkey It is worse than a disgrace - it is a crime that should receive very heavy punishment. But as someone said: and the @EnvAgency do what exactly?

Our Drones and the Law webinar is underway! Rob @BondSolon using a @NatResWales and @gwentpolice example to highlight why the benefits of using unmanned air systems for environmental monitoring and enforcement outweigh any risks or legal requirements. #Drones https://t.co/qjXfbtY5sb

The proof: 1 year post-restoration a previously barren, silt-smothered and fish-impassable section of the River Test now produces buckets of juvenile wild trout!

#WildRiversForWildFish #WillTravelForGravel
